en-US.title: Time Tracker
en-US.subtitle: Simple time tracking for freelancers
en-US.description:
Track your billable hours effortlessly with Time Tracker, the minimalist time tracking app designed for freelancers and professionals.

START TRACKING IN SECONDS
Tap to start, tap to stop. Select your client and project, add an optional description, and Time Tracker handles the rest. No complicated setup, no learning curve.

ORGANIZE BY CLIENT & PROJECT
Keep your work organized with a clear hierarchy: Clients contain Projects, and Projects can have optional Tasks. Perfect for juggling multiple clients or managing different project phases.

REVIEW YOUR HISTORY
See all your time entries grouped by day with daily totals. Quickly review what you worked on and for how long.

BEAUTIFUL THEMES
Choose from 5 distinctive visual themes:
• Midnight Aurora - Dark with vibrant neon accents
• Soft Blossom - Light and elegant pink tones
• Brutalist - Bold black and red high contrast
• Ocean Depth - Deep blues with glass effects
• Sunset Warmth - Warm orange golden hour vibes

WORKS OFFLINE
Start and stop timers even without internet connection. Your entries sync automatically when you're back online.

YOUR DATA, YOUR CONTROL
Time Tracker stores your data securely and never shares it with third parties. Export or delete your data anytime.

PERFECT FOR:
• Freelancers tracking billable hours
• Consultants managing multiple clients
• Anyone who needs simple, reliable time tracking
en-US.whatsNew:
Initial release of Time Tracker!

• Start and stop timers with one tap
• Organize work by client, project, and task
• View time entry history grouped by day
• Choose from 5 beautiful themes
• Works offline with automatic sync
